Package areatwentytwenty

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Arrow
    Arrow extends DynamicBody which creates a Arrow object in the game.
    ArrowHit
    CollisionListener between Arrow and Character
    Character
    Player object in game (extends Walker class)
    Chest
    Chest object (the game's aim is to reach this after collecting all of the coins).
    ChestListener
    CollisionListener for Chest.
    Coin
    Coin object (to be collected by instance of Character).
    Controller
    Controller key listener (extends KeyAdapter) used for controlling instances of Character using the arrow keys.
    DeadlySolidFixture
    Type of SolidFixture which is harmful to instances of Character.
    Game
    Game process with all subcomponent initialisation.
    GiveFocus
    A mouse listener (extends MouseAdapter) gives the focus of keystrokes to a specified component of the game window.
    GLevel
    Abstract class for creation of game levels.
    GraphicalView
    UserView subclass with background image and score display.
    Level1
    Class for the first level extends GLevel attributes/methods and implements ActionListener class (from Timer library).
    Level2
    Class for the second level extends GLevel attributes/methods and implements ActionListener class (from Timer library).
    Level3
    Class for the third level extends GLevel attributes/methods and implements ActionListener class (from Timer library).
    Level4
    Class for the fourth level extends GLevel attributes/methods and implements ActionListener class (from Timer library).
    MenuPanel
    Game control panel (extends JPanel).
    MeteorHit
    CollisionListener for timed Meteor objects.
    Pickup
    CollisionListener for Coin objects and instances of Character in the game.
    Platform
    Static Platform objects which the user can jump/land on.
    PlayerTracker
    PlayerTracker used to keep centre focus the character around the game screen.
